numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Money has an effect on admission to an elite college.
2. The effect of money is not as big as the effect of legacy status.
3. The admissions process seems to favor legacy applicants.
4. I think that this situation is bad.
5. If I apply to a college, then I will not be a legacy applicant.
6. I wonder how the advantage was calculated without legacy status.
7. This situation has an impact on me.
8. This situation has an impact on my community.
9. Most kids of my age look for colleges.
10. This graph can help these kids.
11. This graph can show admissions advantages.
12. This graph can show admissions disadvantages.
13. An elite college can ask a question about legacy status.
14. If a person is an upcoming college applicant, then this graph is important to look at.
